Subject: Easylock in the context menu?
Description:
Hello,

I have noticed that the Easylock is in the Windows context menu.
We only have the Device Control module and this is currently causing confusion as it cannot be used either.
Please take a look at the screenshot.
The button has no function.
Can this entry be removed?

Thank you and best regards
Paul Eisermann
What_We_Know__c:
The Easylock send to option is added back after a computer restart.
-------
The customer wants to remove the send to Easylock option.
Next_Steps__c:
Checking with devs.
---------
Connecting to remove it together.
Solution_Comment__c: CUstomer created a new ticket for a feature request.
